document_data.name: Brigit
document_data.mainbody: '''Brigit''' was the captain of the [[Sisters of Synnoria]], warriors of the [[Llewyrr]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3317}}
document_data.Description: Brigit's face was exceptionally slender and fine-boned, accented by a pair of huge, luminous brown eyes. She had golden hair.
document_data.Relationships: As captain of the Sisters of Synnoria, she commanded, among other Llewyrr, [[Maura]], [[Carina]] and [[Aileen]].
document_data.History: As part of the tradition in which the Sisters of Synnoria became pledged for a year's service to a person of royal birth who rode [[Avalon (horse)|Avalon]], Brigit put her group at the orders of [[Tristan Kendrick]]{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3630}} and the defense of [[Caer Corwell]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|4654}}
